text: __NOTOC__ Year 495 BC was a year of the pre-Julian Roman calendar. == Events == === By place === ==== Roman Republic ==== * A temple is built on the Circus Maximus, between the Aventine and Palatine hills, in Rome, in honour of the god Mercury. ==== China ==== * King Fuchai of Wu ascends to the throne after his father, King Hel√º of Wu, reigning as the last king of Wu until 473 BC. == Births == * Pericles, Athenian politician (d. 429 BC)
title: 495 BC
